ContentDesc_Das Grab der Lohe: Owing to a betrayal, you have been captured by the Amalj'aa and taken to their stronghold of Zanr'ak, there to be given as an offering to the primal Ifrit. If you are to survive this fiery encounter with the Lord of the Inferno, you and your comrades must fight with no less than every onze of your strength. Should you fall, your souls shall burn for eternity...
instancecontenttextdata_ids_19305_Text: Thy soul shall burn for eternity!
instancecontenttextdata_ids_19306_Text: My flames shall consume thy flesh and soul both!
instancecontenttextdata_ids_19307_Text: Surrender thyself to the fires of judgment!
instancecontenttextdata_ids_2600_Text: My flames shall consume thy flesh and soul both!
instancecontenttextdata_ids_2602_Text: Surrender thyself to the fires of judgment!
instancecontenttextdata_ids_2603_Text: Thy soul shall burn for eternity!
